segments.text: I don't know what I can do now . I'm down and out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are not the gray train , I guess . But bite the bullet and you'll soon be in the chips again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope so . But I'm always caught short .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But the darkest hour is the nearest dawn . I bet you'll soon turn the table .
segments.speaker: S2
